author: Pablo Javier Piacente
title: La IA podría producir hasta 5 millones de toneladas de residuos electrónicos en 10 años
text: Inteligencia Artificial / Informática La IA podría producir hasta 5 millones de toneladas de residuos electrónicos en 10 años El cálculo de los científicos incluye elementos de hardware como las unidades de procesamiento, de almacenamiento y los sistemas de alimentación Pablo Javier Piacente La Inteligencia Artificial (IA) depende de mejoras tecnológicas rápidas, incluida la infraestructura de hardware y los chips. Las actualizaciones necesarias para seguir el ritmo del crecimiento de la tecnología podrían agravar los problemas existentes en cuanto a la acumulación de desechos electrónicos: al generar que los equipos se vuelvan obsoletos cada vez con mayor rapidez, los desechos podrían multiplicarse y crear un nuevo problema ambiental. Un nuevo estudio publicado recientemente en la revista Nature Computational Science sugiere que la expansión de la Inteligencia Artificial (IA) generativa, que marca la evolución de esta tecnología, y principalmante los modelos lingüísticos de gran tamaño (LLM), podrían producir entre 1,2 y 5 millones de toneladas de basura electrónica acumulada entre 2020 y 2030. En un escenario de creciente complejidad en cuanto a la gestión de los desechos informáticos, los residuos producidos por la IA podrían agravar este inconveniente. La IA generativa es capaz de crear textos, imágenes u otros medios en respuesta a comandos: aunque ya se encuentra en desarrollo, promete una intensa evolución en los próximos años. Sin embargo, requiere recursos informáticos sustanciales para la capacitación e inferencia del modelo: frente a esto, aún no se han abordado las implicaciones de los desechos electrónicos que pueda generar y sus estrategias de gestión. Problemas críticos de sostenibilidad Los autores del nuevo estudio, de la Academia China de Ciencias y la Universidad Reichman en Israel, presentan un marco de análisis de flujo de materiales, basado en la potencia computacional, para cuantificar y explorar formas de administrar los desechos electrónicos producidos por la [IA generativa](https://www.levante-emv.com/tendencias21/2024/11/01/ia-procesar-ilusiones-opticas-cerebro-111096954.html), con un enfoque centrado en los modelos de lenguaje grande. Vale recordar que estos modelos son los más utilizados en las aplicaciones masivas y están detrás de los chatbots como ChatGPT o Gemini, entre otros. De acuerdo a un [artículo](https://www.sciencealert.com/scientists-predict-ai-to-generate-millions-of-tons-of-e-waste) publicado en Science Alert, las necesidades tecnológicas de estos sistemas plantean problemas críticos de sostenibilidad, incluido el consumo de energía y la huella de carbono asociados con estas operaciones. A esto hay que sumarle una realidad relacionada con el consumo hogareño: si la IA generarativa acelera la obsolescencia de los equipos, tendremos al mismo tiempo una multiplicación de los residuos electrónicos. ¿Cómo lograr una IA verdaderamente sostenible? Según [informa](https://www.aiwire.net/2024/11/06/the-growing-e-waste-footprint-of-genai/#:~:text=While%20the%20threat%20of%20e,memory%20units%2C%20and%20storage%20drives) Aiwire, en 2022 se produjeron 62 millones de toneladas de desechos electrónicos a nivel global, un dato que representa un aumento del 82 % con respecto a los niveles de 2010. Si esta tendencia se mantiene, se prevé que la generación mundial de desechos informáticos aumente en un 32 % adicional, llegando potencialmente a 82 millones de toneladas para 2030. Los cálculos del nuevo estudio agregan otros posibles 5 millones de toneladas producidos específicamente por el avance de la IA. Por último, el profesor Shaolei Ren, de la Universidad de California en Riverside, en Estados Unidos, quien no participó de la investigación, indicó en una [publicación](https://sciencemediacentre.es/la-expansion-de-la-ia-generativa-podria-generar-hasta-cinco-millones-de-toneladas-de-basura) de Science Media Centre España que “la previsión del documento es un indicador razonable de los residuos electrónicos que probablemente generará la IA generativa. Se trata de una cuestión crítica, aunque a menudo se pasa por alto, a la hora de considerar el futuro impacto social de la [IA generativa](https://www.levante-emv.com/tendencias21/2024/11/10/ia-cambiar-opinion-creyentes-fervorosos-108219108.html). Además de invitar a un debate más profundo, la investigación destaca el papel crucial de una economía circular para lograr una IA verdaderamente sostenible”, concluyó Ren. Referencia [E-waste challenges of generative artificial intelligence](https://www.nature.com/articles/s43588-024-00712-6). Peng Wang et al. Nature Computational Science (2024). author: @le_parisien
title: « Je vais te niquer, Juif de merde » : un homme violemment pris à partie dans le tramway de Montpellier, un homme arrêté
text:
« Je vais te niquer, Juif de merde » : un homme violemment pris à partie dans le tramway de Montpellier, un homme arrêté
Un homme en a agressé violemment un autre dans le tramway de Montpellier, en proférant des insultes à caractère antisémite. Une enquête a été ouverte pour « violence en raison de la race ou de la religion ».
Il s’agit d’une scène d’une grande violence. Un homme a subi ce mardi une agression
à caractère antisémite dans le tramway de Montpellier, indiquent la préfecture de l’Hérault sur X (ex-Twitter) et le parquet de Montpellier au Parisien, confirmant une information du Metropolitain. Un homme âgé de 48 ans a été interpellé et placé en garde à vue ce jeudi, a également confirmé auprès du Parisien le procureur de la République, Jean-Christophe Tixier.
La scène, qui s’est déroulée aux alentours de 14 heures, a été filmée et diffusée sur les réseaux sociaux. Dans celle-ci, il est possible de voir un homme demander à un autre s’il est « juif » à plusieurs reprises. « Et toi, je te demande si t’es Juif », lui rétorque l’homme pris à partie. « Moi je suis pas Juif, je suis Marocain », lui répond-il avant de se jeter sur lui et de le frapper. « Je vais te niquer ta mère », déclare-t-il alors. Au moment de quitter le tramway après avoir été repoussé par des usagers, l’agresseur lance : « Juif de merde » à sa victime.
Le parquet de Montpellier confirme ces propos, mais indique qu’il « n’existe pas d’authentification de la vidéo en l’état ». Il assure avoir ouvert une enquête « du fait de violence en raison de la race ou de la religion ». « Cette qualification est susceptible d’évoluer au gré de l’enquête », poursuit-il.
D’après
 Le Figaro, l’homme frappé est âgé de 67 ans. Selon le parquet, la victime a indiqué avoir reçu des coups de poing et de pied. Une de ses dents a également été cassée.
Un appel à témoins
Sur X, le sénateur de l’Hérault et conseiller régional d’Occitanie Hussein Bourgi a lancé un appel à témoins « pour faire avancer l’enquête », tout en « condamnant » une « agression antisémite ». De même, le Conseil représentatif des institutions juives de France (CRIF) appelle les personnes témoins de l’agression à « contacter la police ». « Votre témoignage sera précieux pour l’enquête. »
Le maire de la ville Michaël Delafosse a pour sa part condamné fermement,
sur X, « cette agression antisémite ». « Tous les moyens sont mis à disposition (vidéo surveillance, témoignages…) pour arrêter l’auteur de ces faits qui ne peuvent rester impunis. Ceux qui propagent un climat propice à l’antisémitisme portent une lourde responsabilité », a-t-il réagi.

author: Diario Libre
title: Casos de dengue se redujeron un 86 % en el Hugo Mendoza - Diario Libre
text:
El Hospital Pediátrico Dr. Hugo Mendoza informó que ha atendido un total de 329 casos de dengue en lo que va de año, lo que representa una reducción significativa del 86 % en comparación con los 2,416 casos atendidos del año pasado.
En ese sentido, la directora del centro de salud , Dhamelisse Then, aseguró que esta baja se atribuye a las estrategias implementadas por el Ministerio de Salud Pública, que incluyen la eliminación de criaderos de mosquitos, campañas de concienciación comunitaria y una vigilancia epidemiológica robusta.
"Estas medidas han sido fundamentales para prevenir brotes significativos y mantener la enfermedad bajo control", expresó la galena a través de una nota de prensa.
Asimismo, destacó el fortalecimiento de la Unidades de Cuidados Intensivos Pediátricas en la Red Pública, gracias al Servicio Nacional de Salud (SNS), lo que representa un aumento del 95 % en la disponibilidad de espacios para la atención crítica pediátrica. Además, subrayó que el personal del centro ha recibido capacitación en el curso sobre abordaje de dengue de la Organización Panamericana de la Salud ( OPS ), lo que asegura una atención especializada y actualizada para cada caso.
RELACIONADAS
Salud Salud Pública: Casos confirmados de dengue llegan a 1,165 y a 827 los de malaria

author: Angela Shah
title: Nevada Lithium Mine Secures Funding, Proceeds to Construction | Engineering News-Record
text:
News
Mining
Nevada Lithium Mine Secures Funding to Begin Construction
The final $250 million investment needed to proceed with the construction of the nearly $3 billion Thacker Pass lithium project in northern Nevada has been acquired, according to the the project's developer Lithium Americas.
The funding, provided by New York-based Orion Resource Partners, will pay for the first phase to develop what would be the largest lithium mine and processing facility in North America. Last year, Vancouver, Canada-based Lithium Americas and General motors announced a joint venture agreement to develop the project providing a separate $100 million and $192 million in cash, respectively.
The project also received funding in October 2024 through a $2.26 billion loan from the U.S. Department of Energy (DOE) to assist in financing construction. The current investment announced on April 1 finalizes the requirements of the DOE loan, Lithium Americas said.
In its first phase, the Thacker Pass mine is projected to produce 40,000 metric tons of battery-quality lithium carbonate annually — enough to power up to 800,000 electric vehicles.
“Thacker Pass will help enable a completely domestic supply chain for electric vehicle batteries, from mining to chemical processing to battery production,” said Ailie MacAdam, president of Bechtel’s mining and metals business, said in a press release. “Having a reliable domestic supply of lithium will be critical to America’s economic competitiveness and energy security.
Once construction of the initial phase is complete by late 2027, Thacker Pass is expected to single-handedly produce eight times the current total U.S. output of lithium carbonate, according to Lithium Americas. An expected second phase of the project is expected to produce an additional 40,000 metric tons of lithium carbonate annually and make the project the largest lithium mine in North America, the company claims.
Demand for lithium is expected to grow in the coming years since it is a critical component for electric vehicle batteries. And if EV manufacturers meet requirements on the percentage of components used that are produced and processed in the U.S., they can benefit from Inflation Reduction Act tax credits.
The Thacker Pass project consists of an open pit mine and lithium processing operations in an area north of Winnemucca, Nevada in Humboldt County. Lithium Americas has a joint-venture ownership with automaker General Motors.
Bechtel, the construction manager, began pre-construction work on the project in November 2022. The company said early works such as procurement and engineering are complete, including the ordering of long lead equipment and site grading and excavation.
The Thatcher Pass project began in earnest in 2018 but was stalled when environmental groups sued the U.S. Bureau of Land Management in 2021. The groups argued that the agency failed to properly address cumulative environmental impacts of the project in approving permits in the waning days of the first Trump administration.
There were also accusations that the agency did not adequately consult with Native American tribes in the area who held that the mine site is sacred grounds.
A federal appellate court in San Francisco in 2023 rejected those claims, saying the Land Management bureau’s final environmental impact statement was satisfactory under the law. The court also said the agency had adequately consulted with tribes, which “did “not raise any concerns about specific traditional areas, sacred sites or ceremonial areas or activities in the project area.”
topics: Economy, Business and Finance->metal and mineral mining and refining
Economy, Business and Finance->investment and opinion pieces

author: Poster
title: Everwarm Mini Heater: The Ideal Heater For Small Spaces
text:
The Everwarm Mini Heater has been gaining some attention in multiple circles very recently due to its promising combination of compact size, powerful heating, and energy efficiency. This detailed review will provide insights into the features, performance and overall functionality of the product based on user experiences, expert analyses, and customer feedback.Design:First and foremost, the Everwarm Mini Heater is an aesthetically pleasing appliance that will blend seamlessly into any décor. Its sleek modern look is coupled with a compact design, making it perfect for small spaces. Despite its size, various users affirm that it does not compromise on its heating capabilities. Moreover, its portable nature ensures that you can move it around easily.Performance:One of the reasons for the Everwarm Mini Heater's rising popularity is its mighty performance. Users have praised its ability to heat rooms quickly and effectively. It is found to be especially useful in drafty areas where managing cold is difficult. While it doesn't have the capacity to heat a large room or an entire house, it certainly stands out for personal use and smaller spaces like offices, dorms, or bedrooms.Energy Efficient:Another critical aspect worth mentioning in the
Everwarm Mini Heater reviews is its energy efficiency. As per the claims from the manufacturer and feedback from users, the appliance uses less energy compared to other heaters in the market. This can contribute to significant savings on electricity bills in the long run, making it a preferred choice for budget-conscious consumers.Built-in Features:The product comes equipped with multiple beneficial features. Users have appreciated the adjustable thermostat, which allows them to control the temperature according to their comfort level. The automatic shut-off feature ensures safety by turning the heater off when it overheats. Others also found the timer feature convenient, as it allows them to set a time for the heater to turn on or Everwarm Mini Heater Review off automatically.Noise Level:When it comes to noise level, reviews indicate that the Everwarm Mini Heater performs admirably. While it's not entirely silent, the noise it generates is reported to be minimally intrusive. For those seeking a balance between noise levels and heating performance, this product appears to be a reliable choice.Price & Value for Money:Given its outstanding features and efficient performance, the price of the Everwarm Mini Heater is often deemed justified by its users. Most agree that the device offers excellent value for money. The heater's longevity also factors into this consideration; several reviewers reported that their units were still functioning well after considerable use.Customer Service:Customer service is a crucial aspect that can considerably impact customers’ experiences, and Everwarm seems to have maintained a good image in this respect. Users have left positive reviews about their interactions with the brand’s customer support staff, reflecting that any issues they had were promptly and effectively addressed.In conclusion, based on the collection of Everwarm Mini Heater reviews, it is apparent that consumers greatly appreciate the product for its compact size, powerful performance, energy efficiency, and a host of user-friendly features. While it may not be the ideal choice for heating a larger space, it proves to be an excellent pick for personal use or small spaces. The Everwarm Mini Heater provides impressive value for money and, along with its robust customer service, it merits serious consideration for those seeking a portable, efficient heating solution.

author: Geeta Pillai
title: Minda Youth Movement and BSPCares Host Bubur Bonanza for Ramadhan in Brunei
text:
As the holy month of Ramadhan unfolds, the Minda Youth Movement (MYM) in collaboration with BSPCares, launched a heartwarming initiative titled ‘Tambak Marhaban’ programme at the Youth Building on Jalan Maulana, Brunei. This two-day event, which commenced yesterday, is a testament to the community's spirit of giving and solidarity during a time of spiritual reflection.
Advertisment Uniting for a Cause The programme kick-started with MYM members and BSPCares volunteers dedicating their morning to the meticulous preparation and packaging of 270 packs of ‘bubur’. This traditional porridge, often associated with the breaking of fast during Ramadhan, symbolizes more than just sustenance; it embodies the essence of sharing and caring within the community. The drive-through distribution method adopted in the afternoon ensured a smooth and efficient handover to recipients, emphasizing safety and convenience amidst the ongoing global health considerations.
Building Community Bonds Advertisment This initiative not only nourishes the body but also strengthens the bonds within the community. By engaging in such charitable activities, MYM and BSPCares are setting a powerful example of how collective efforts can make a significant impact. The ‘Tambak Marhaban’ programme is a reflection of the community’s resilience and commitment to supporting one another, especially during the sacred month of Ramadhan. It is an inspiring reminder of the spirit of togetherness and the importance of giving back to the community.
Reflections and Looking Forward The success of the ‘Tambak Marhaban’ programme serves as a beacon of hope and showcases the positive outcomes that can be achieved through collaboration and compassion. As we move forward, it is crucial to carry forward this spirit of generosity and empathy, not just during Ramadhan but throughout the year. Such initiatives not only address immediate needs but also foster a culture of mutual respect and understanding, paving the way for a more inclusive and supportive society.

author: Liam Grace
title: Alan Shearer blames two Arsenal stars over contentious West Ham goal
text:
Alan Shearer has blamed Arsenal duo Declan Rice and Gabriel Magalhaes over Tomas Soucek’s contentious goal for West Ham on Thursday night.
Arsenal news, exclusives and analysis
Privacy Policy https://policies.google.com/privacyand Terms of Serviceapply.
Arsenal were left furious as
VAR controversially did not rule out Soucek’s first-half goal at the Emirates after the ball appeared to go out of play in the build-up.
Shearer, though, has singled out Rice and Gabriel for criticism over the Hammers’ opening goal for failing to stop Jarrod Bowen, who provided the assist.
‘When they look at it, [Arsenal will] be really disappointed,’ Shearer told Amazon Prime in his half-time analysis.
‘Bowen is able to get in behind Rice and in front of Gabriel. He decided to mark the space instead of mark the man.
‘There’s plenty to get stuck into despite whether the ball went out or not. If you look at Rice, he doesn’t know where Bowen is.
‘Gabriel does know where Bowen is, and he can mark him, he should mark him in reality.
‘He goes to defend the space instead of the man. Bowen is the one who causes the damage and keeps the ball alive and Soucek sticks it away.
‘From Arsenal’s point of view, it is really poor defending.’
Meanwhile,
Gary Neville couldn’t help himself from trolling Arsenal fans following Soucek’s controversial goal in north London.

author: Cathodieuze
title: ÉSOTÉRISME ET PRATIQUES OCCULTES : QUELS DANGERS ?
text:
ÉSOTÉRISME ET PRATIQUES OCCULTES : QUELS DANGERS ?
Nouvelles spiritualités et pratiques occultes : quels dangers ?
Mercredi 12 juin – 20h15 – salle du Casino – Sarrebourg
La sorcellerie revient à la mode. 70 % des jeunes de 18 à 24 ans sont séduits par l’ésotérisme et un Français sur quatre consulte les voyants. Les magnétiseurs ou les propositions de soins énergétiques inspirées de spiritualités asiatiques (Reiki, yoga, Chi-Gong, acupuncture, etc.) fleurissent dans nos cités. Le chamanisme est une pratique courante et de « nouvelles spiritualités » se présentent comme des alternatives à la religion chrétienne. La conférence essaiera d’analyser ce phénomène et d’apporter des éclairages sur une réalité parfois nébuleuse. S’agit-il d’une quête spirituelle ou d’une simple recherche de bien-être ? Quelles clés pouvons-nous utiliser pour discerner parmi toutes les thérapies alternatives et méthodes de développement personnel ? Quel regard chrétien pouvons-nous poser sur l’utilisation de pratiques occultes et magiques ?
Le père Jean-Christophe THIBAUT est
prêtre du diocèse de Metz, chargé de paroisses et aumônier d’un centre de santé. Comme historien des religions et spécialiste des courants ésotériques, le père Thibaut intervient dans de nombreux collèges et lycées sur les questions de magie et de spiritisme, et donne des conférences sur l’ésotérisme et les phénomènes diaboliques dans des paroisses ou pour des mouvements et associations. Après avoir écrit des romans sous le pseudonyme de Michael Dor (tétralogie fantastique La Porte des Anges aux éditions Médiaspaul et Les enquêtes de l’abbé Nicolas Stock aux éditions Salvator), le père Thibaut a publié plusieurs ouvrages spirituels : Délivre-nous du mal, guide de discernement des phénomènes diaboliques, éditions Artège (2020), Un regard chrétien sur la Sophrologie, éditions Artège 2021, La prison des esprits (en collaboration avec Olivier Joly), éditions Salvator 2021, Les nouveaux visages de l’ésotérisme, éditions Artège 2022 et Un regard chrétien sur l’agriculture biodynamique, éditions Artège 2024.
